name: Elemental Ball
componentes: VSM (a tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur)
descricao:
A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within range then blossoms with a low roar into an explosion of elemental power. Each creature in a 20-foot radius must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes 8d6 elemental damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Depending on the element, there are additional effects:
	[Fire] It ignites flammable objects in the area that aren’t being worn or carried.
	[Water] It put offs any non-magical flames.
	[Air] All targets that failed the Dexterity saving throw also are pushed 10-feet away from the impact point.
	[Earth|Metal] All targets that failed the Dexterity saving throw also get their next turn movement cut by half.
	[Light|Shadows] The spell has an extra 1d6 of damage.
	[Lightning] All creatures within 5 feet of a target that failed the Dexterity saving throw also receive 1d4 of damage.
	[Poison] All targets that failed the Dexterity saving throw get poisoned and receive 1d4 acid damage at the starting of each consecutive turn. To remove this effect, they must succeed a Constitution saving throw.
	**Enhance Spell**. For each 1000 extra mana spent, add an additional 1d6 to the damage up to 6 extra d6s.
